column5: Hey guys, just had a chance to get out to the water for the first time all year today! Was a pretty good day, just fishing for crappie and such with worms as bass seasons are not yet open in my region. But boy was I surprised when that bobber sunk under and I reeled into in a 4 pound largemouth on the other end!( Which I promptly released of course). Anyways, good fishing to all of you
the bass do like to bite this time of year
catch anything else or just the one bass?
Yes we did catch a few other crappie and even a catfish
We want pictures  Dont be like me, and forget to take any
